code: import React from'react';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{CART_SLICE_ACTIONS}from'../../redux/cartSlice';import'./CartItem.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CartItem=function CartItem(_ref){var cartItem=_ref.cartItem;var dispatch=useDispatch();var quantity=cartItem.quantity,inclTaxPrice=cartItem.inclTaxPrice,description=cartItem.description,image=cartItem.image;var handleIncrementCartItem=function handleIncrementCartItem(){dispatch(CART_SLICE_ACTIONS.addItemToCart(cartItem));};var handleDecrementCartItem=function handleDecrementCartItem(){dispatch(CART_SLICE_ACTIONS.removeItemFromCart(cartItem));};var handleRemoveCartItem=function handleRemoveCartItem(){dispatch(CART_SLICE_ACTIONS.clearCartItem(cartItem));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"checkoutItemContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"imageContainer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"image",src:image,alt:"".concat(description)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"smallWidth",children:[" ",description," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"smallWidth quantity",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"arrow",onClick:handleDecrementCartItem,children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"value",children:"( "+quantity+" )"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"arrow",onClick:handleIncrementCartItem,children:"+"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"smallWidth",children:[" ",inclTaxPrice.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"removeButton",onClick:handleRemoveCartItem,children:"\u2715"})]});};export default CartItem;
